price: 68. “Mijn dienaren, Op deze dag zullen jullie niet vrezen noch zullen jullie bedroefd zijn."
arabic: يَٰعِبَادِ لَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ وَلَآ أَنتُمۡ تَحۡزَنُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: yāʿibādi lā khawfun ʿalaykumu al-yawma walā antum taḥzanūna
